name: wi_vars
author: Jannik Mewes / Wolf Interactive
title: Wolf Interactive - Variables plugin
descr: This plugin allows access to several useful variables like {{wi_var:sitename}} and {{wi_var:baseURI}}. It is now possible to access data of active menuitem using {{wi_var:menuitem:title|alias|myvar}}. Works together with wi_menuitem_params! A really simple if clause is possible too - but without nesting! Use {{wi_var:if:var_name}} {{wi_var:endif}}
